titles.title: Safe In The Arms Of Jesus (easy - very nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Safe in the arms of Jesus Safe on his gentle breast There by His love o'er shaded Sweetly my soul doth rest{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Safe in the arms of Jesus Safe on His gentle breast There by His love o'er shaded Sweetly my soul doth rest Hark - 'tis a song of heaven Borne in a song to me Over the fields of glory Over the crystal sea{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Safe in the arms of Jesus Safe from corroding care Safe from the world's temptations Sin cannot harm me there Free from the blight of sorrow Free from my doubts and fears Only a few more trials Only a few more tears{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus my heart's dear Refuge Jesus has died for me Firm on the Rock of Ages Ever my trust shall be Here let me wait with patience Wait till the night is o'er Wait till I see the morning Break on the golden shore{/lang-eng}
